title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.7 - Display of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.7 - Display of license

State Regulations

Every licensed agent shall prominently display such
agent's license in an area visible to the general public in each place of
business where lottery tickets are sold. In addition, the agent shall display
an authorized lottery agent decal on a prominent front window or door of the
agent's premises so as to be readily visible to the public. The agent shall
maintain and display all informational and promotional material in connection
with ticket sales of each lottery in accordance with instructions issued by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5001.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
